<small>Hebrew form: [[H3736]]</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כַּרְבְּלָא‎</span>] **noun feminine** probably ==helmet, cap== (&gt; al. ***mantle***, e.g. [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 62</sup>; see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]) (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּרְבָּלָה‎</span> ***comb*** of cock; so Jewish-Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כַּרְבָּלְתָא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***karballatu***</u></abbr>, ***cap*** [[BDB#Andr|Andr]]<sup>M 67 \*</sup>, [[BDB#M-A|Muss-Arn]]<sup>Assyrian Dict. 436 a</sup>; so [[BDB#Cook|SAC]]<sup>JPhii. xxvi. 310 f.</sup>, compare Biblical Hebrew [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כרבל‎</span>]); — plural suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כַּרְבְּלָֽתְהוֺן‎</span> [[Dan.3.21|Dan 3:21]].
